extension.description: Joomla 3 and VM3 plugin to load a product at the bottom of an article. To configure, see product tab at the article content page. This plugin requires mod_virtuemart_product_multi module which is used to render the product style. If a product is associated to an article, the VM product details page will get automatically redirected to the corresponding Joomla Article. This plugin and mod_virtuemart_product_multi can be used as a simple substitution of the whole VM product details page.
